title: User Signup with Valid Data
description: Verify that a new user can successfully sign up with valid email, password, and required details.

steps.description: Navigate to the signup page
Enter valid email, password, and confirm password fields
Submit the signup form
Check that signup completes successfully and user is redirected to verification or dashboard page

title: User Signup with Invalid Email
description: Verify that signup fails when an invalid email format is provided.

steps.description: Navigate to the signup page
Enter invalid email format with valid password
Submit the signup form
Form displays an error for invalid email and signup does not proceed

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Verify that a user with valid credentials can log in successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter registered email and correct password
Click the login button
Verify user is authenticated and redirected to workspace dashboard

title: User Login with Incorrect Password
description: Verify that login fails when an incorrect password is entered.

steps.description: Navigate to the login page
Enter registered email and incorrect password
Click the login button
Verify error message is displayed and user remains on login page

title: User Email Verification Process
description: Verify that verification email link works and user can verify their account.

steps.description: Complete signup with new user
Access the verification email received
Click verification link and complete verification process
Verify that user account is marked as verified and user can access dashboard

title: Workspace Dashboard Data Loading
description: Verify that the workspace dashboard loads user-specific data and renders properly.

steps.description: Log in as a valid user
Navigate to the workspace dashboard
Verify dashboard displays correct user data and components load without error
Verify UI adapts correctly on different screen sizes (responsive check)

title: Edit User Profile Successfully
description: Verify that user can edit and save changes to their profile information.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to profile edit page
Modify fields such as name, avatar, or bio
Submit changes
Verify profile updates are saved and displayed correctly

title: Profile Edit Validation Errors
description: Verify form validation and error messages occur when invalid profile data is entered.

steps.description: Navigate to profile edit page
Enter invalid data inputs (e.g. unsupported image format, invalid characters)
Attempt to save changes
Form rejects invalid inputs and shows appropriate error messages

title: Navigation Bar Links and Session Persistence
description: Verify that global navigation links route correctly and user session remains active during navigation.

steps.description: Log in to the application
Use the global navbar to navigate to profile, community, marketplace, messages, and tickets pages
Each page loads correctly and maintains authenticated user session

title: Community Engagement - View and Post
description: Verify that user can view community posts and create new posts.

steps.description: Navigate to community page
Verify list of community posts is displayed
Create a new community post with valid content
Verify the new post appears in the community feed

title: Marketplace - Browse Items and Purchase Flow
description: Verify the marketplace allows browsing items and completing a purchase transaction.

steps.description: Navigate to marketplace page
Verify items and services are listed correctly with details
Select an item and initiate purchase
Complete purchase with valid payment/process flow
Verify purchase confirmation and item ownership update

title: Messages - Send and Receive
description: Verify user can send a message to another user and receive messages successfully.

steps.description: Navigate to messages page
Select a user to initiate a new message
Send a message with valid content
Verify that the message appears in the conversation
Verify that incoming messages from other users appear in the message list

title: Messages - Send Empty or Invalid Message
description: Verify sending empty message or invalid content is prevented with error handling.

steps.description: Navigate to messages page
Attempt to send an empty message
Verify form disables send button or shows validation error

title: Ticketing System - Create and Manage Tickets
description: Verify users can create new support or task tickets and update ticket status.

steps.description: Navigate to tickets page
Create a new ticket with valid subject and description
Verify new ticket appears in ticket list with correct details
Update ticket status (e.g. mark as resolved)
Verify ticket status updates correctly in the UI and backend

title: UI Components Rendering Consistency
description: Verify all reusable UI components render correctly across pages with consistent styling.

steps.description: Navigate through pages: login, signup, dashboard, profile, community, marketplace, messages, tickets
Verify buttons, inputs, cards, dialogs, avatars, and forms render consistently and function correctly

title: Supabase Integration - Authentication and Data Storage
description: Verify that Supabase integration correctly handles authentication, data fetching and updating without errors.

steps.description: Perform user login, signup, and verification flows
Create, update, delete entries in profile, community posts, marketplace listings, messages, and tickets
Verify changes reflect accurately in the UI and database without errors

title: Form Input Validation Across Application
description: Verify all forms validate inputs correctly and display user-friendly error messages.

steps.description: Attempt invalid inputs in forms for signup, login, profile edit, community post, marketplace listing, messaging, and tickets
Verify validation errors display as expected and invalid submissions are prevented

title: Session Persistence and Logout Flow
description: Verify user session persists during navigation and logout works correctly terminating the session.

steps.description: Log in successfully
Navigate across multiple pages
Verify user session remains active during navigation
Click logout
Verify user session terminates and is redirected to login page

title: Error Handling for Network Failures
description: Verify the application handles network failures gracefully with appropriate user feedback.

steps.description: Simulate network failure during data requests
Attempt actions such as login, data fetching, form submissions
Verify error messages or fallback UI is displayed indicating network issues

title: Edge Case: Extremely Large Profile Picture Upload
description: Verify system behavior when uploading a very large image as profile avatar.

steps.description: Navigate to profile edit page
Attempt to upload a very large image file as profile picture
Verify system handles upload properly with size limits or shows error message
